content: herringbone hat sizes baby child adult needles us 4 16 circular us 6 16 circular us 6 double pointed needles yarn 2 colors of dk weight yarn i used looped yarn works dk weight which is a 60% merino 40% romney blend and has 265 yds per skein notions stitch markers tapestry needle cast on with smaller circular needle cast on 80 100 120 sts i used the long tail co join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts place marker ribbing k2 p2 - repeat to end of round continue in k2 p2 ribbing until band measures 1 5 2 3 from co edge or to desired length body change to larger circular needle and begin chart pattern repeat chart pattern until hat measures 3 5 3 75 4 25 from co edge or to desired length crown shaping stop following chart and change to main color only k8 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k7 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k6 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k5 k2tog repeat to end of round change to dpns when needed continue decreasing in this manner until 8 10 12 sts remain cut yarn leaving about a 6 tail thread tail on tapestry needle and bring through remaining sts weave in ends and block gently add a giant pompom and wear or gift proudly ©anne mizoguchi 2016
